title: King's Bounty: The Legend
notes: Very poor performance. Sub 20 fps during battles on mid and low settings @ 1080p. Dips to 10 fps and lower during battle animations/effects. Steam overlay does not display properly.

title: King's Bounty: The Legend
notes: It runs, but performance is horrible ~10fps

To fix invisible hero, I had to edit registry as described here: https://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=19045&iTestingId=96626
But FPS is very low, it's uncomfortable to play.
